description: Real-time Django-React integration via WebSockets with automatic state synchronization
rules: Always use instance.save() - never Model.objects.update() as it bypasses signals
Serializers must be nested ModelSerializer instances
Channel files must be named channels.py for auto-discovery
Run makefrontend after serializer or channel changes
ContextChannel.has_permission() is called once on connect to check access
Use @action decorator for RPC methods callable from frontend
Use @consumer decorator to subscribe to Django Channels groups
